thread.title: Malala in tears on emotional return to Pakistan

title: Malala in tears on emotional return to Pakistan
text:
Malala in tears on emotional return to Pakistan 1:17pm BST - 00:59 
For the first time since she was shot in the head by the Taliban six years ago, Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai has made an emotional visit back home to Pakistan. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
For the first time since she was shot in the head by the Taliban six years ago, Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai has made an emotional visit back home to Pakistan.
